176/365: Fresh Air 2011

05.07.2011

Thanks to one of my Flickr contacts I was made aware of Fresh Air 2011, a sculpture exhibition held in a tiny village in the Cotswolds. I wasn't going to go, feeling disillusioned with my photos and all, but I'm glad I did in the end.

Today was mostly about reflections, it seems.
